This repository contains the files created for the course project of Getting and Cleaning Data Project.

The R code file Run_Analysis will work if the working directory contains all the data files and folders, which were 
downloaded from https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip 

The repository also contains the tidy data sets and codebook.
